content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Biagio., Biagio just said to you: '"Ah, grazie Marco! Feels good to finally get that sorted, eh?"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Biagio! Glad we could get it sorted for you. Feels good on my end too!"

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Biagio., Biagio just said to you: '"Ah, Marco! Grazie! That's a weight off my mind, honestly."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Biagio. Glad I could help. Just doing my job!"
